title: FPS drop in game, need help fixing!
body: Hello, I'm a Silver 4 NA player. Recently I got a new computer, but I've been having horrible FPS when im in game (10 fps roughly). I was wondering why I have these problems. Btw, i have an AMD processor, not sure what model, but I'll post it as soon as I can.

replies.body:
Hey **BlazeBlack2**,

It looks like you're having FPS issues! Try the solutions provided in this [Low Frame Rate (FPS) Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) article!
Can't fix it until Riot fixes their game! A lot of people are having lower FPS issues now, and some can't even play due to it.

My system used to be able to run this game like sex. 60 fps with high settings without blinking. Now im lucky to get 40 fps on low. Riot fucked up. This game is currently ruined for me. Welcome to the club. Also, Riot will never acknowledge this. Sorry buddy.

I think I may have found the cause. My processor runs about 1GHz, while the recomended for league is 2GHz. However if this is the problem, this makes no sense since before i had 25-30 fps the week i downloaded the game :/
